alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 6:18PM EDT until July 25 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Androscoggin County in southwestern Maine... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 618 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lewiston to near Mechanic Falls, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Auburn, Mechanic Falls, Lisbon, Greene, Poland, Sabattus, Wales, Minot and New Gloucester. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 74 and 90. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
